cause.description:
It's finally time to face the truth: Our dear friend Rob is not going to get any taller. Let's all band together to help support his Cosmetic Leg Lengthening procedure!
1. It's not fair to everyone else that Bearded Midgets always get in free. Time for Rob to start paying cover!
2. He'd look a lot sexier in a wedding dress.
3. We're running out of dwarfism jokes.
cause.mission: Raise funds for Rob's Cosmetic Leg Lengthening procedure
cause.name: Make Rob Taller!
